mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `qna` ( cate1, cate2, title, content, file1, file2, uid, answercomplete, regip, rdate) VALUES ( #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{title}, #{content}, #{file1}, #{file2}, #{uid}, #{answercomplete}, #{regip}, #{rdate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate2` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 AND a.cate2 = b.cate2 WHERE `parent`=0 ORDER BY `qnano` DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10
SELECT * FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate2` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 AND a.cate2 = b.cate2 WHERE a.cate1= #{cate1} AND `parent`=0 ORDER BY `qnano` DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `qna` WHERE cate1 = #{cate1, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND `parent`=0
SELECT * FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate2` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 AND a.cate2 = b.cate2 WHERE `qnano`= #{qnano}
SELECT * FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate1` as b JOIN `cate2` as c ON a.cate1 = c.cate1 AND a.cate2 = c.cate2 AND a.cate1 = b.cate1 WHERE `qnano` = #{qnano}
SELECT * FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate2` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 AND a.cate2 = b.cate2 JOIN `reply` AS c ON a.qnano = c.qnano WHERE a.qnano=#{qnano}
SELECT a.*, b.rcontent FROM `qna` AS a LEFT JOIN `reply` AS b ON a.qnano = b.qnano WHERE a.qnano = #{qnano};
SELECT a.*, b.* FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate2` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 AND a.cate2 = b.cate2 ORDER BY `qnano` DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM `qna` AS a JOIN `cate1` as b JOIN `cate2` as c ON a.cate1 = c.cate1 AND a.cate2 = c.cate2 AND a.cate1 = b.cate1 WHERE `qnano` = #{qnano}
